agenda.name: Areological Science
agenda.objective: Formalize methodologies and disciplines in studying Mars's environment
agenda.findings: Collect evidence of proposed organic process for the origin and evolution of the planet
agenda.data: Characterize the morphology and features of local landforms as a part of the global system

capability.description: Catalogue mineral volatiles due to volcanic outpurings, impacts, and crustsal fracturing
Investigate how terrain features relate to seismic activities
Design a multi-sensor network for time-series observation and data analysis

agenda.name: Colony Construction
agenda.findings: Understand implications and best practices in mass resource utilization and distribution
agenda.data: Study Marsquakes on erected structures and environment

capability.description: Study meteorological environmental factors
Fortify building structural integrity
Refine techniques for ISRU polymer synthesis

agenda.name: Finding Life
agenda.objective: Answer the question of life past and present on Mars
agenda.findings: Look for signature of life in soil data
agenda.data: Analyze and Cataloging data from various sites

capability.description: Follow the water
Search regions capable hosting/sustaining microbial life
Analyze bio-signatures in rocks and mineral ice
Core drill rock data from selected locations

agenda.name: Health Hazards
agenda.objective: Research short and long term medical impact on human health
agenda.findings: Identify on the various health hazards for human beings living on Mars
agenda.data: Classify environmental hazards for surface operation

capability.description: Investigate biological hazards
Examining microbes in water ice
Observe radiation risks, limits and exposures

agenda.name: Human Habitation
agenda.objective: Characterize and determining factors contributing to human habitability
agenda.findings: Identify engineering challenge in constructing surface, underground and cliff-side dwelling
agenda.data: Analyze atmospheric conditions and geographical factors of human habitability in a local region

capability.description: Predict meteorological changes
Study underground water reserve
Characterize radiation countermeasures

agenda.name: Planet Life
agenda.findings: Survey sociological and ideological implications in populating a region
agenda.data: Unlock factors for transforming Mars into hospitable biomes to usher in human colonization

capability.description: Conceptualize interplanetary transportation network
Study terraforming Mars environment
Investigate environmentally sustainable energy solutions
Improve vehicle range and performance

agenda.name: Mineral Prospecting
agenda.objective: Prospect mineral deposits and evaluate mineral compositions
agenda.findings: Document the process and history of climate on Mars
agenda.data: Analyze the wealth of mineral contents from the colleted soil data

capability.description: Analyze various signatures of minerals
Corroborate surface geological data with on-orbit scans
Analyze meteorite fragments
Core drill rock data from selected locations

agenda.name: Communication Network
agenda.objective: Develop proven construction methods for erecting terrestrial-based communication stations
agenda.findings: Identify components and computational tools critical for technological breakthrough
agenda.data: Analyze gravity and atmospheric variability for deploying laser communication array

capability.description: Identify methods for safeguarding and securing surface communication equipments
Assess environmental suitability for communication network
Analyze the weather impact

agenda.name: Space Testing and Integration
agenda.objective: Characterize environmental protocols for rigorous experimentation and testing
agenda.findings: Determine human factors and for setting up restricted and quarantine zones
agenda.data: Characterize the morphology of this local region as test bed for developing advanced technologies of interest

capability.description: Develop techniques for automation for testing and experimentation
Survey sites for environmental suitability for various projects
Identify methods of hazard wastes management
Integrate hardware equipment and computational tools

agenda.name: Settling Mars
agenda.objective: Make Mars the second home for humanity
agenda.findings: Investigate local in-situ resources that one can collect and process for immediate uses
agenda.data: Analyze structural integrity of geological features for building settlements in this region

capability.description: Engineer soil capable of hosting and sustaining organic microbial life
Improve building structural integrity
Minimize physiological effects of long term exposure to martian environment

agenda.name: Space Research
agenda.objective: Leapfrog scientific knowledge and technological pursuit
agenda.findings: Develop framework for applied space research in this frontier
agenda.data: Analyze various region impact how space research is conducted

capability.description: Study planetary surface, meteorolgy, climate, atmosphere and space plasma
Test new flexible space suit micro fabric
Improve closed-loop life support system

agenda.name: Space Tracking
agenda.objective: Populate advanced sensors for space observation and tracking platforms
agenda.findings: Assess locations for placement of terrestrial-based sensors for orbital tracking and observation
agenda.data: Measure and identify spectral signatures of man-made and natural space objects

capability.description: Test designs for fixed ground and mobile observatory
Test radiation-proof fabric and barrier
Improve methodologies and algorithms for tracking space objects

agenda.name: Surface Operations
agenda.objective: Push boundaries of surface logistic operations
agenda.findings: Identify the human factors and logistics concerns in surface operations
agenda.data: Analyze soil's strength for the suitability of spaceport construction

capability.description: Stress test on human endurance
Test return vehicle capability
Characterize dynamics of human interactions
Extend EVA operations to climbing caves

agenda.name: Space Commerce
agenda.objective: Build up capabilities and infrastructures supporting commerce
agenda.findings: Spearhead the development of economic framework and policies to address concerns
agenda.data: Analyze system deficits that hinder the growth of commerce

capability.description: Characterize manufacturing and resource production in relation to local economy
Test space-ground links
Identify social factors in developing commerce
Conceptualize interplanetary transportation network

agenda.name: Space Economy
agenda.findings: Address regulatory concerns in developing space business and infrastructures
agenda.data: Gather metrices on commercial space activities

capability.description: Spearhead accelerator group
Develop space labs and facilitate knowledge transfer
Supervise and support space government services
Establish international partnership in the space sector

agenda.name: Space Sustainability
agenda.objective: Incentivize private and corporate ownership of properties and resources in space
agenda.findings: Supports statutes to meet the growing demand for sustainable transporation and logistic needs
agenda.data: Analyze and rank policies for enhancing mass resource utilization

capability.description: Characterize industry opportunities and innovations in the space sector
Create stable financial avenue based on settlement economic data
Identify social factors in developing commerce
Legislate responsible spaceflight framework and guidelines regarding space debris

agenda.name: Space Accessibility
agenda.objective: Partner with public and private actors and fund cooperative projects to allow member states to launch space missions
agenda.findings: Meet the functional criteria of the growing demand for space access and logistic
agenda.data: Collect and analyze member states' sustainable development goals

capability.description: Contribute to initiaitive in enabling deveoping and emerging countries to grow their space sector
Level the playing level and create new sponsorship for emerging players
Identify social factors in developing partnership
Develop infrastructure, faciltiy and service as a part of a high impact and high visibility initiative
